entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.1°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
